sql.packageGroupId: SELECT distinct value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'GroupConfig.groupHolder.%.groupId'
sql.packageGroupName: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'GroupConfig.groupHolder.%.groupName'
sql.packageGroupVersion: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'GroupConfig.groupHolder.%.version'
sql.packageGroupInitTime: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'GroupConfig.groupHolder.%.initTime'
sql.packageGroupPackageId: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'GroupConfig.groupHolder.%.packageId'
sql.packageGroupCreateTime: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'DirectPackageConfStore.mapHolder.%.createTime'
sql.packageGroupGroupNames: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'DirectPackageConfStore.mapHolder.%.groupNames'
sql.packageGroupPackId: SELECT distinct value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'DirectPackageConfStore.mapHolder.%.packId'
sql.packageGroupTableIds: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'DirectPackageConfStore.mapHolder.%.tableIds'
sql.packageGroupUserName: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'DirectPackageConfStore.mapHolder.%.userName'
sql.packageName: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'DirectPackageConfStore.mapHolder.%.name'
sql.packageGroupMap: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'GroupConfig.packageGroupMap.%'
sql.fieldTransferName: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'DirectFieldTransferNameConfDBStore.mapHolder.%'
sql.holderTables: SELECT id, value FROM FINE_CONF_ENTITY WHERE id LIKE 'ReportTablesConfig.holder.%.tables'
sql.defaultTableId: SELECT distinct value FROM fine_conf_entity WHERE id LIKE 'DefaultTableIdNameStore.nameMap.%'
sql.defaultTableIdFD: SELECT distinct value FROM fine_conf_entity WHERE id LIKE 'DefaultTableIdNameStoreFD.nameMap.%'
sql.holderEngineType: SELECT distinct value FROM fine_conf_entity WHERE id LIKE 'DirectEntryConfStore.mapHolder.%.engineType'
sql.holderCreatorName: SELECT distinct value FROM fine_conf_entity WHERE id LIKE 'DirectEntryConfStore.mapHolder.%.creatorName'
sql.holderName: SELECT distinct value FROM fine_conf_entity WHERE id LIKE 'DirectEntryConfStore.mapHolder.%.name'
sql.holderEscapeMap: SELECT distinct value FROM fine_conf_entity- WHERE id LIKE 'DirectEntryConfStore.mapHolder.%.escapeMap.%'
sql.holderTransferName: SELECT distinct value FROM fine_conf_entity WHERE id LIKE 'DirectEntryConfStore.mapHolder.%.transferName'
sql.dashboardIndex: SELECT id, applyTime, createBy, folder, hangout, initTime, lastUpdateTime, mountedDirIds, name, pId, reportId FROM fine_dashboard_index
sql.fineClassName: SELECT id id, className value FROM FINE_CONF_CLASSNAME WHERE id IN $1
sql.fineDbInfo: SELECT id, value FROM fine_conf_entity WHERE id IN $1
sql.connectionCreateInKey: SELECT distinct f.value FROM fine_conf_entity f WHERE f.id = 'ConnectionConfig.connections'
sql.reportTable: SELECT CONCAT('ReportTablesConfig.holder.' , r.reportId , '.tables') id, r.tables value FROM fine_report_tables_index r
